assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: LH is affiliated to a hospital that offers a CF carrier screening test on their website. She received a grant from the Netherlands Organization for Health Research and Development (ZonMw) to study public interest in this test. The remaining authors declare no conflict of interest.
